name: safe_click
title: Safely perform a click
description: Perform a guarded click with scaling awareness and post-click confirmation guidance.

arguments.name: coordinate_source
arguments.description: `logical` if already adjusted, `screenshot` if measured on an image

arguments.name: clicks
arguments.description: Number of clicks (1 for single, 2 for double)

content.text: Reason: {{reason}}. Prepare to click at ({{x}}, {{y}}) using button={{button}} and clicks={{clicks}}. If coordinate_source is 'screenshot', enable auto_scale and note the applied scaling; if 'logical', keep auto_scale false. If you are unsure, grab a quick `screenshot_with_grid` first and ask for confirmation. Call `click_screen` accordingly and return success, applied_scaling, and any warnings. Suggest taking a follow-up screenshot if verification is needed.
